name: Dora Dora Emotion: Seihaiden
overview: A young treasure hunter named Asuta travels together with his faithful companion, the cute angel-like creature Mink. One day, Mink tells her "master" about the floating continent Norland. Rumors say that a golden tablet of immense value is hidden somewhere on that continent. Asuta and Mink travel to Norland and try to enter the Queen's palace. However, it seems that the people of Norland only have respect to those who are proficient in the ancient game of mahjong. Mink quickly teaches Asuta how to play the game, and they challenge the famous people (read: young, pretty women) of the country to the bloodless battle! DoraDora Emotion is a combination of adventure, mahjong board game, and interactive sex scenes. The adventure gameplay consists mainly of exploring the land of Norland. The locations are accessed via a map. The player clicks on objects of interest in order to receive information and advance the story. From time to time, mahjong matches will be held, as dictated by the story. It is required to win a match in order to proceed in the game. The interactive sex scenes feature a point-and-click interface with "smart cursor", which turns into various icons (mouth, hand, etc.) depending on the situation and the body part the player wishes to interact with.
